title: Puri Agung Karangasem Royal Palace (Half-day)
overview: Visit the historic Puri Agung Karangasem, the royal palace of East Bali, and explore its architecture and gardens.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the palace grounds, halls, and gardens.

title: Puri Agung Karangasem & East Bali (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Puri Agung Karangasem and other East Bali cultural sites.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the palace grounds, halls, and gardens.
Visit nearby attractions such as Tirta Gangga or Ujung Water Palace.
